main event: A brilliant green spherical object with orange and red tail markers was observed in the sky near Falls Church, Virginia (near Washington, D.C.) on January 29, 1952 at around 11:30 PM.
interesting points: The object was about three times the diameter of the main spherical part and traveled at a high rate of speed on an erratic course.
The observer stated that the object did not resemble a meteor or meteorite.
The object was only observed by a single witness.
The sighting occurred in darkness under clear weather conditions.
sighted object: a brilliant green spherical object with orange and red tail markers
